channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLUME-2475] toLowerCase/toUpperCase used without Locale parameter to manipulate Enum
item.description: .toLowerCase() / .toUpperCase() is used intensively in Flume's code base without passing Locale.ENGLISH to it. This breaks Flume depending on the system locale.
item.summary: toLowerCase/toUpperCase used without Locale parameter to manipulate Enum

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
